name: EnamuFarm
description: Well this was meant to be an .apk file for mobile but I got an error while exporting so here we are. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ The WebGL version also decided not to work so I had to make it an .exe, and I'm not sure if the aspect ratio is working correctly with it. It SHOULD automatically set the resolution when you start the game, but if it doesn't, then... well, it's pretty much screwed. Thank you Android Studio for the DexArchiveMergerException, I don't think I'm gonna give mobile games another shot for a while.
